item.description:
Celebrate Your Pet's Right to Play this Summer! We'll have lots of FUN Games & Activities to Entertain our four legged Friends...Playing in the Sandbox, Splashing in the Pool, Bobbing for Hot Dogs, an Ice Cream Eating Contest, & More! So bring your Pal for Fourth of July fun!

RSVP 978-649-8585
Proof of Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
www.bestfriendspetcare.com
item.name: Fourth of July Fun!
